name: text-based-odyssey
description: Welcome to Rust and Redemption: A Text-Based Oddyssey. This is a text-based adventure game that is played in the terminal. The game is a choose-your-own-adventure style game where the player is given a scenario and must choose from a list of options. The player's choices will affect the outcome of the game. The game is set in a post-apocalyptic world where the player must survive and make it to the end of the game. The game is written using MVC architecture such as Handlebars, Express, and Node.js.
